video.title: America's Book of Secrets
video.synopsis: This engaging documentary series shares the surprising backstories of familiar institutions like the Pentagon, West Point and the Playboy Mansion.

episodes.synopsis: Discover the White House's most secret room and what makes it so powerful, from its hidden history to clandestine visitors.
episodes.title: The White House

episodes.synopsis: Explore the secret history and rituals of the Freemasons, a clandestine society with a membership so powerful it helped shape America.
episodes.title: Freemasons

episodes.synopsis: Learn the secrets of one of the most secure structures in the world, the protector of America's vast wealth that's synonymous with gold.
episodes.title: Fort Knox

episodes.synopsis: Learn the facts about one of America's most covert and infamous military bases, which protects highly confidential research and development.
episodes.title: Area 51

episodes.synopsis: Discover the stately manor's secret places, decadent gatherings and special indulgences usually reserved for beautiful women and Hollywood's elite.
episodes.title: The Playboy Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Travel by land, sea and air to explore the special construction, elite training and secret weapons that protect the president when he goes mobile.
episodes.title: Presidential Transports

episodes.synopsis: Go undercover to discover the secret training, special operations and high-tech tools used in America's most powerful police force.
episodes.title: The FBI

episodes.synopsis: Discover the complex selection process, secret traditions and elite training that cadets experience at the world's most prestigious military academy.
episodes.title: West Point

episodes.synopsis: Discover the top-secret operations and state-of-the-art training of the U.S. Special Forces, who undertake the most dangerous missions on Earth.
episodes.title: Black Ops

episodes.synopsis: Go behind the Pentagon's concrete walls and reinforced windows to witness the complex operations of the U.S. Department of Defense.
episodes.title: The Pentagon

episodes.synopsis: American popular culture abounds with stories of alien creatures. Could humankind really have been visited by beings from other worlds?
episodes.title: The Ancient Astronaut Cover-Up

episodes.synopsis: Discover the secrets behind the sinister success of the American Mafia, which the FBI says still has approximately 3,000 active members.
episodes.title: The Mafia

episodes.synopsis: Discover the true world of these original domestic terrorists, who take cover in the rights and freedoms that they are actively seeking to destroy.
episodes.title: The Ku Klux Klan

episodes.synopsis: Since the 1970s, the United States has been plagued by an estimated 1,400 serial killers, secretly stalking the streets on a mission to kill.
episodes.title: Serial Killers

episodes.synopsis: Discover shocking facts about the nearly 200 neo-Nazi groups and other white and Aryan power hate groups operating in the United States.
episodes.title: American Nazis

episodes.synopsis: Currently in the U.S., there are more than 5,000 cults with approximately 200,000 Americans who serve as secret -- and mostly willing -- members.
episodes.title: Deadly Cults

episodes.synopsis: Transparency is supposed to be one of the hallmarks of the U.S. presidency, but how much do we really know about what goes on inside the Oval Office?
episodes.title: Presidential Cover-Ups

episodes.synopsis: Explore conspiracies behind America's 40-year anti-drug campaign, including why the government classifies marijuana and heroin as equally dangerous.
episodes.title: The Drug Wars

episodes.synopsis: Discover new information about the nation's Sasquatch secrets and why millions of Americans are convinced the mysterious man-ape is real.
episodes.title: The Mystery of Bigfoot

episodes.synopsis: Learn the real stories behind the four successful presidential assassinations and the multitude of failed attempts over the last century.
episodes.title: Presidential Assassins

episodes.synopsis: Discover the secret world of American treasure hunters, who believe that there are hidden fortunes all around the country just waiting to be found.
episodes.title: Lost Treasures

episodes.synopsis: The Hells Angels are one of the most secret clubs in America, with members forbidden or afraid to publicly discuss the biker brotherhood -- until now.
episodes.title: Hells Angels

episodes.synopsis: Explore the hidden origins, doctrine, secret language and methods of the controversial organization as former members speak out.
episodes.title: Scientology

episodes.synopsis: Secret surveillance methods used to watch, monitor and record our every move are examined as the question of whether privacy is now extinct is asked.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: As political dissidents, sociopaths and religious zealots bent on destruction hide in plain sight, the odds of winning the war on terror are examined.
episodes.title: American Terrorists

episodes.synopsis: Insiders discuss the role of gold in the U.S. economy, including who sets the price, how its value is controlled and where it's stored.
episodes.title: The Gold Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: Special forces who operate in the shadows, the employment of asymmetrical warfare and the underground war waged over the Internet are investigated.
episodes.title: America's Secret Armies

episodes.synopsis: The maximum-security world of America's incarcerated is unveiled, along with hidden agendas, covert operations and scandalous prison practices.
episodes.title: Secret Prisons

episodes.synopsis: Get an inside look at the country's wealthiest citizens and the extent of their influence, including the secret political power of "dark money."
episodes.title: The Billionaire Agenda

episodes.synopsis: Experts reveal secrets about the tunnels, cities and fortresses constructed under American soil and expose potential threats to homeland security.
episodes.title: Secret Underground

episodes.synopsis: The inner world of the elite force of brave men and women who risk their lives is examined, including the impact of recent threats and scandals.
episodes.title: The Secret Service

episodes.synopsis: With a list of doomsday scenarios looming over the world, humankind's level of preparation and the tough questions that must be asked are examined.
episodes.title: America's Doomsday Plan
